title: Must be level 6 to post
body: Can't reply to posts on other boards! It says I must be level 6 but I've been level 30 for a while now.

replies.body:
When you first come to the boards to post, you do have to be a certain level before it will let you. Once you post here in Help&Support, your board's profile will sync with your game profile and then you'll be able to post and reply.

Now that you've posted here, you should be able to freely post and reply. Hit me back up if you still can't ^_^!
